General.Name: Apetit Oyj
General.Description: Apetit Oyj operates as a food company in plant-based food products primarily in Finland, Norway, Germany, Sweden, and internationally. It operates through two segments: Food Solutions and Oilseed Products. The company develops, produces, markets, and sells frozen vegetables, frozen vegetable and fish based ready foods, and frozen pizzas; and vegetable and rapeseed oils, and other oilseed products. It also offers burgers and nuggets, frozen pizzas, gratines, and arctic peas. In addition, the company manufactures various products for private labels. The company also exports its products. It serves retailers, and food service and animal feed industries, as well as the hotel, restaurant, and catering sector. Apetit Oyj was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
